trans-unit.source: Represents an interoperable binding that derives from <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"></xref> and provides support for the updated versions of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security*>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ReliableSession"></xref>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBindingBase.TransactionFlow*> binding elements.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma associação interoperável que deriva de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"> </xref> e oferece suporte para as versões atualizadas do <> </> *>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ReliableSession"> </xref>, e <> </> *> elementos de associação.

trans-unit.source: The WS2007HttpBinding class adds a system-provided binding similar to <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> but uses the Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards (OASIS) standard versions of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableSession>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBindingBase.TransactionFlow%2A> protocols.
trans-unit.target: A classe WS2007HttpBinding adiciona uma associação fornecida pelo sistema semelhante ao <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>, mas usa a organização para as versões de avanço de Structured Information Standards (OASIS) padrão do <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableSession>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBindingBase.TransactionFlow%2A>protocolos.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBindingBase.TransactionFlow%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableSession> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: No changes to the object model or default settings are required when using this binding.
trans-unit.target: Nenhuma alteração para as configurações padrão ou de modelo de objeto é necessária ao usar essa associação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding> class and sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol> properties that specify the WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3, WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2, and WS-I Basic Security Profile 1.0 security protocols.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa uma instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding>classe e define o <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol>propriedades que especificam o 1.1 do WS-Security, WS-Trust 1.3, 1.3 WS-SecureConversation, WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2 e WS-I Basic Profile 1.0 de segurança protocolos de segurança.</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion> </xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"> </xref> classe com um tipo de segurança usado pela associação especificado.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>que especifica o tipo de segurança que é usada com a mensagem SOAP e para o cliente.</xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"></xref> class with a binding specified by its configuration name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"> </xref> classe com uma associação especificada por seu nome de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The binding configuration name for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007HttpBindingElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome da configuração de associação para o <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007HttpBindingElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The binding element with the name configName was not found.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de associação com o nome configName não foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding and a value that indicates whether a reliable session is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"> </xref> classe com um tipo específico de segurança usado pela associação e um valor que indica se uma sessão confiável está habilitada.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding> class and sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol> properties that specify the WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3, WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2, and WS-I Basic Security Profile 1.0 security protocols.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa uma instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding>classe e define o <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol>propriedades que especificam o 1.1 do WS-Security, WS-Trust 1.3, 1.3 WS-SecureConversation, WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2 e WS-I Basic Profile 1.0 de segurança protocolos de segurança.</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion> </xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>que especifica o tipo de segurança que é usada com a mensagem SOAP e para o cliente.</xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a reliable session is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se uma sessão confiável está ativada. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the security binding element from the current binding.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o elemento de associação de segurança da associação atual.
